prompts: Create a whimsical grass-type Pokemon that looks like a cluster of fruits.
I want a Pokemon that embodies both plant and psychic traits, with a quirky design.
Generate a unique creature resembling a bunch of eggs, with varying facial expressions.
Make an adorable Pokemon that can be found in forests, featuring multiple small bodies.
Imagine a round, pink Pokemon with a sunny disposition, perfect for a sunny day.

distinctive_features: One body has a yellow flower on top
